:• '''800''' Mbps max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''800 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|N800 High Power WiFi Gigabit Router/AP/Range Extender}} :{{SupportPage/sandbox|vendor=ASUS|model=RT-N800HP}} *Web GUI: http://router.asus.com "1244-01001115-50Z" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/NDD9568291707/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photos-3627538 FCC photos]. {{See also|ASUS RT-N18UHP|Edimax Gemini RG21S}} *Antenna: 4x 5dBi fixed antennas :High Power - 29.5dBm (930mW) Firmware 3.0.0.4.382.50032 (2018/03/20) - 10.59MB (zip) ===Overview=== *'''High gain''' four antennas & high power design - unbeatable signal strength *'''256QAM''' technology boosts WiFi speed up to 800Mbps - 33% faster than N *'''VPN server''' and client support - network encrypted and private connection *'''Parental control''' - Monitor and apply scheduled time limits for your children *'''Intuitive ASUS Router app''' lets control your network anywhere, without a PC ===See also=== *[[ASUS RT-N16UHP]] ° *[[ASUS RT-N18UHP]] • *[[ASUS RT-N800HP]] *[[ASUS RT-N56U B1]] *[[ASUS
